name: Casino Panic!
description:
Casino Panic! is a game where you play as Viola, a magical girl thief extraordinaire. In space!  She's looted a mysterious gun from a shady casino and triggered the security. Can she survive? 

Controls

ASWD - Move Player

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Quick Swap

Enter - Pause

NOTE: Sadly our music and sounds aren't working in the build, but we'll make sure to fix them post-jam.
